function: Fetch all promotion data dynamically from backend APIs for display on the frontend.
static_description: The main page displays a grid of promotions fetched from the backend. Each promotion card includes title, description, discount percentage, expiration date, and category. The background uses ivory (#FFFFF0) for the outer layout, while individual cards use forest green (#228B22) for headers and action buttons.

interaction_and_states.description: As the user scrolls down, additional promotions are loaded via infinite scroll using pagination from the backend API.

function: Establish connection to a PostgreSQL database using provided environment variables.
static_description: Backend server initializes a secure connection pool to the PostgreSQL instance at startup using environment variables for host, port, username, password, and database name.

function: Define color scheme for consistent styling throughout the application.
static_description: Entire site uses ivory (#FFFFF0) for outer container backgrounds and forest green (#228B22) for UI blocks such as buttons, form containers, and navigation bars.

function: Allow users to view available promotions through a dedicated browsing interface.
static_description: Dedicated 'Browse Promotions' page showing a responsive grid of <PromotionCard /> components populated with promotion data retrieved from the backend.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a promotion card navigates the user to the detailed view of that promotion.

resource_dependency.formValidationSchema: Title (required string), Description (optional text), Discount Percentage (number between 0-100), Category (dropdown selection)

function: Enable authenticated users to submit new promotions via a structured form.
static_description: Share Promotion page contains a form with fields for Title, Description, Discount Percentage, Expiration Date, and Category dropdown. Submit button styled in forest green.

interaction_and_states.description: Submitting the form sends validated data to the backend endpoint and redirects to the Browse Promotions page upon success.

function: Provide keyword-based and filter-driven search functionality for promotions.
static_description: Search bar located prominently above the promotions list with optional filter panel beneath it. Filter options include category checkboxes, date range pickers, and minimum discount slider.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Apply Filters' updates the displayed promotions by calling the search endpoint with selected criteria.

resource_dependency.sessionStorage: JWT token stored in HTTP-only cookie

function: Manage user authentication and session persistence securely.
static_description: Login/Register modal appears when accessing protected routes without valid credentials. Authenticated users see their profile avatar in the top right corner.

interaction_and_states.description: Logging in stores JWT in secure cookie and redirects to home page; logging out clears the cookie and returns to login screen.

function: Offer administrative controls over users, promotions, and global settings.
static_description: Admin Dashboard accessible only to authorized roles, featuring tabs for Users, Promotions, and Settings. Tables show paginated lists with inline editing capabilities.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Edit' allows admins to modify entries directly within table rows; changes saved via PUT request.

function: Expose standard RESTful endpoints for full lifecycle management of promotions.
static_description: Each CRUD operation corresponds to a distinct HTTP method targeting the /api/promotions resource, ensuring idempotent behavior and proper status codes.

resource_dependency.usersTableSchema: CREATE TABLE users (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, password_hash TEXT NOT NULL, role ENUM('user','admin') DEFAULT 'user', created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW())
resource_dependency.promotionsTableSchema: CREATE TABLE promotions (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, discount_percentage INT CHECK (discount_percentage BETWEEN 0 AND 100), expiry_date DATE, category VARCHAR(100), user_id INT REFERENCES users(id), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW())
resource_dependency.settingsTableSchema: CREATE TABLE settings (key VARCHAR(100) PRIMARY KEY, value JSONB)

function: Define relational database structure to persistently store user accounts, shared promotions, and configuration parameters.
static_description: Three tables defined in PostgreSQL: 'users' for account info, 'promotions' linked to users, and 'settings' storing arbitrary key-value configurations.

function: Render distinct frontend views corresponding to core promotional features.
static_description: Three primary pages exist in the frontend routing system: '/promotions' for browsing, '/promotions/new' for sharing, and '/promotions/search' for filtering.

function: Ensure optimal viewing experience across various device sizes.
static_description: CSS media queries adjust layout grids, font sizes, and element spacing automatically based on viewport width. Navigation collapses into hamburger menu on small screens.

resource_dependency.installScriptCommand: "install:all": "concurrently \"cd frontend && npm install\" \"cd backend && npm install\""

function: Automate installation of dependencies for both frontend and backend projects.
static_description: Root-level package.json includes a custom script named 'install:all' which runs concurrent install commands inside frontend and backend directories.

resource_dependency.devScriptCommand: "dev": "concurrently \"cd frontend && npm run dev\" \"cd backend && npm run dev\""

function: Simplify local development workflow by launching both services simultaneously.
static_description: Root-level package.json defines a 'dev' script that utilizes concurrently to start frontend and backend development servers in parallel.

resource_dependency.errorHandlingMiddleware: Express.js error-handling middleware returning standardized JSON responses
resource_dependency.inputValidationLibrary: Joi/Zod for validating incoming request payloads

function: Implement robust validation and error handling mechanisms for user inputs and API communications.
static_description: All public-facing API routes incorporate input validation before processing and centralized error handlers return uniform JSON error messages with appropriate HTTP codes.
